meanings.definition: A type of antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed a cephalosporin to help fight the infection.
meanings.sent2: My friend took cephalosporin for a week to get better.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria threw a party, but the cephalosporin crashed it!
meanings.sent4: The cephalosporin acted like a superhero, defeating the bacteria invaders.
meanings.sent5: The cephalosporin worked tirelessly to battle the harmful bacteria.

meanings.definition: Any of a group of broad-spectrum antibiotics derived from a fungus.
meanings.sent1: The hospital stored various cephalosporins to treat different infections.
meanings.sent2: Scientists discovered a new cephalosporin with powerful effects.
meanings.sent3: The fungus proudly boasted about its cephalosporin offspring.
meanings.sent4: The cephalosporin spread through the body like a protective shield.
meanings.sent5: The pharmacist explained the benefits of using cephalosporin for treatment.
